column4: Hey, how do I get rid of the little network icon in the what's-it-called area in my toolbar?
it's just a garbage front end to ifconfig
i got rid of it ages ago
unless you do a lot of wireless roaming, it's kinda pointless
System -> Administration -> Network does the same thing
as far as setting up ip's is concerned
it's got a ways to go...
you could try IRC with pidgin
i don't get all the fancy IRC features Xchat has, but it's simple and conservative
and has worked pretty well thus far
so many options, darn this linux!
it could be an obscure gconf optoin
